mapper.select: SELECT a.address_id AS addressId, a.mobile_no AS mobileNo, a.receive_name AS receiveName, p.area_name AS provinceName, c.area_name AS cityName, d.area_name AS countyName, a.building_name AS buildingName, a.detail_addr AS detailAddr, a.default_flag AS defaultFlag FROM ACC_ADDRESS a, SYS_USER u, BAS_AREA p, BAS_AREA c, BAS_AREA d WHERE a.user_id = u.user_id AND a.province_id = p.area_id AND a.city_ID = c.area_id AND c.parent_area_id = p.area_id AND a.county_id = d.area_id AND d.parent_area_id = c.area_id AND p.area_level = '1' AND c.area_level = '2' AND d.area_level = '3' AND a.user_id =#{userId}
SELECT area_id AS areaId,area_name AS areaName FROM BAS_AREA WHERE parent_area_id =#{parentAreaId}
SELECT building_id AS buildingId, building_name AS buildingName FROM BAS_BUILDING d WHERE county_id = #{countyId} AND status = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE ACC_ADDRESS SET default_flag = '1' WHERE address_id = #{addressId}
UPDATE ACC_ADDRESS SET default_flag = '0' WHERE user_id=#{userId}
